VectorSurrogates.cs
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 using System.Runtime.Serialization;
2 using UnityEngine;
3 
4 namespace FullInspector.Serializers.Formatter {
5  internal class Vector2Surrogate : ISerializationSurrogate {
6  public void GetObjectData(object obj, SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) {
7  var vec = (Vector2)obj;
8  info.AddValue("x", vec.x);
9  info.AddValue("y", vec.y);
10  }
11 
12  public object SetObjectData(object obj, SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context, ISurrogateSelector selector) {
13  return new Vector2(info.GetSingle("x"), info.GetSingle("y"));
14  }
15  }
16  internal class Vector3Surrogate : ISerializationSurrogate {
17  public void GetObjectData(object obj, SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) {
18  var vec = (Vector3)obj;
19  info.AddValue("x", vec.x);
20  info.AddValue("y", vec.y);
21  info.AddValue("z", vec.z);
22  }
23 
24  public object SetObjectData(object obj, SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context, ISurrogateSelector selector) {
25  return new Vector3(info.GetSingle("x"), info.GetSingle("y"), info.GetSingle("z"));
26  }
27  }
28  internal class Vector4Surrogate : ISerializationSurrogate {
29  public void GetObjectData(object obj, SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context) {
30  var vec = (Vector4)obj;
31  info.AddValue("x", vec.x);
32  info.AddValue("y", vec.y);
33  info.AddValue("z", vec.z);
34  info.AddValue("w", vec.y);
35  }
36 
37  public object SetObjectData(object obj, SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context, ISurrogateSelector selector) {
38  return new Vector4(info.GetSingle("x"), info.GetSingle("y"), info.GetSingle("z"), info.GetSingle("w"));
39  }
40  }
41 
42  internal class VectorBinaryFormatterWorker : IFormatterWorker {
43  public void Work(DictionarySurrogateSelector surrogates, StreamingContext context) {
44  surrogates.AddSurrogate(typeof(Vector2), context, new Vector2Surrogate());
45  surrogates.AddSurrogate(typeof(Vector3), context, new Vector3Surrogate());
46  surrogates.AddSurrogate(typeof(Vector4), context, new Vector4Surrogate());
47  }
48  }
49 }
